Description: NEW VICTORIAN STYLE LADIES QUARTZ SWEET TIME POCKET WATCH PENDANT, NECKLACE "Sweet Time" Pocket Watch Pendant. The ultimately romantic timepiece dangles upon your cashmere blouse in perfect rhythm with your heart. Cast faithfully from an antique. 32" chain. 2" watch. This piece is new, comes in a red velvet bag. Thanks for looking and happy Buying! You’re Friends at Pier 58 outlet.
